kind.description: The type of resource, in this case, a group member.

id.description: The unique identifier for the group member.

email.description: The email address of the group member.

role.description: The role of the group member within the group.

type.description: The type of member, for example, user or group.

etag.description: An opaque entity tag that identifies the resource's current state.

status.description: The status of the group member, typically active or suspended.
